Articles.Content: I have been floating around here since .18. I figured it was time to come and say hi. I have had a many or hours of fun with this program. IMHO this is the best game ever. I am constantly learning something new, sometimes by complete accident. But anyways, thanks for having me.
Not exactly hello, Mikehahn78. Welcome to the forum.
Sort-of-hello, Mike! Don't break anything - that's Danny's job!
Yeah, my load time are not pretty. I'm asking the Mrs. for more ram for Christmas.
